episodes.title: Born Into My Grandfather's Ultra-Religious Cult - Michelle Dowd
episodes.description:
Michelle Dowd is a journalism professor and contributor to The New York Times, The Los Angeles Times, TIME magazine, Alpinist, and other national publications. She was raised on a mountain in the Angeles National Forest where she learned to identify flora and fauna, navigate by the stars, forage for edible plants, and care for the earth. Her memoir, Forager: Field Notes on Surviving a Family Cult, showcases her life growing up on an isolated mountain in California as part of an apocalyptic cult, and how she found her way out of poverty and illness by drawing on the gifts of the wilderness.


Timestamps:
0:00 The Cult Leader
14:30 Cult Believes
16:30 Cut-off From The Real World
19:00 Life On The Mountain
30:00 Learning To Forage
35:20 Relationships In The Cult 
38:00 Psychological Impact
44:00 Leaving The Cult
